yachaka balaaniyak anurapura aakramanayaka poson uthsawaya samaye sigaman yadimata paminena sanwidhanathmaka yachaka balaani jathika poson sathiya aarambha wu pereda (05) rathriya wanawita anuradhapura nagara aakramanaya kara atha. poson uthsawaya sandaha dhawanaya wana wishesha dumriya osse ha dura gaman bas rathawalin pereda (05) rathriya wanawita aaganthuka aakramanika yachakayan siyayakata wadi pirisak anuradhapura nagarayata pamina siti athara anuradhapura parani puja nagaraye sinha kanuwa dumriya nagaraya ruwanmalisaya shri maha bodhi pethmaga awata owun wisiri sitina ayuru dakagatha hakiwiya. poson uthsawaya wenuwen sama wasarakama pitasthara pradeshawala sita sigaman yadima sandaha paminena yachakayan poson pohoya dinayata dina kihipayakata ihathadi pamina anuradhapura puja bhumiya mihinthala puja bhumiya ha thanthirimalaya puja bhumiwetha wisira yana athara owunta nawathan labadimata pawa wiwidha piris anuradhapura nagaraye sitina bawa wartha wiya.
